thread.title: Argentine striker Aguero ruled out for a month with injury
thread.title_full: Argentine striker Aguero ruled out for a month with injury

author: NewsWire
title: Argentine striker Aguero ruled out for a month with injury
text: Buenos Aires, Oct 10 (IANS) Argentine striker Sergio Aguero has been ruled out for a month with a hamstring injury suffered in their 0-2 home defeat against Ecuador . The 27-year-old was stretchered off after just 22 minutes on Thursday. “I think I’ll be a month without playing,” Aguero was quoted as saying by bbc.com on Saturday. Aguero, who plays his club football for Manchester City, may miss four English Premier League games as a result of his latest injury . City has only just Wilfried Bony as a recognised central striker, in the absence of Aguero. Related Posts
